page.title: 04IRVINE LARGE CO.
page.content:
One of the{large companies}to choose Irvine to expand in, is Beechams,a world wide company which makes pharmaceuticals and other products.The Beecham group have chosen Irvine for their factory for a variety of reasons:_ cheap rates,grants to attract business to the Irvine area, good road systems,near the sea for pumping waste, near the deep water terminal at Hunterston and close to Prestwick Airport.
The Beechams factory at Irvine makes{pure penicillin}which is sent to other Beecham factories to be made into semi_synthetic penicillin.Beecham employs 680 workers most of whom live in the Irvine area.
